name: SHMatchedMediaItem
desc: An object that represents the metadata for a matched reference signature.

items.name: var matchOffset: TimeInterval
items.desc: The timecode in the reference recording that matches the start of the query, in seconds.

items.name: var predictedCurrentMatchOffset: TimeInterval
items.desc: The updated timecode in the reference recording that matches the current playback position of the query audio, in seconds.

items.name: var frequencySkew: Float
items.desc: A multiple for the difference in frequency between the matched audio and the query audio.
